about_the_game:
Thank you for your support!

I want to release more free games in the future but also need to stay hydrated (coffee) while making new games.

This DLC unlocks a new button in the main menu where you can change the costume of Mr. Mat Hematic to green.

The game will remain free forever and this DLC does not add more gameplay like more levels and game mechanics.
detailed_description:
Thank you for your support!

I want to release more free games in the future but also need to stay hydrated (coffee) while making new games.

This DLC unlocks a new button in the main menu where you can change the costume of Mr. Mat Hematic to green.

The game will remain free forever and this DLC does not add more gameplay like more levels and game mechanics.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
